mapper.select: select d.device_id,d.acnum from t_device d left join t_user_device c on (d.device_id = c.device_id) where c.user_id = #{userId} order by d.device_id asc

select d.device_id,d.acnum from t_device d left join t_user_device c on (d.device_id = c.device_id) where c.user_id in ( select u.user_id from t_user u left join t_user_role ur ON ur.user_id = u.user_id where u.parent_id = #{parentUserId} and ur.role_id = #{roleType} and u.user_id != #{bindUserId}) ORDER BY d.device_id ASC;

select tud.*, u.username, u.realname from t_user_device tud left join t_user_role tur on (tur.user_id = tud.user_id) left join t_user u on (tur.user_id = u.user_id) where tud.device_id = #{deviceId} and tur.role_id = #{roleId}
